channel.title: Move2Kube on Documentation for Konveyor projects
channel.description: Recent content in Move2Kube on Documentation for Konveyor projects

item.title: Overview
item.description: The Move2Kube tool helps application owners migrate legacy workloads to run on Kubernetes clusters and eventually automate their deployments after multiple iterations. It analyzes Docker Compose files, Cloud Foundry manifest files, and even source code to generate Kubernetes deployment files including object YAML files, Helm charts, and operators. Move2Kube has a very modular architecture making it easy to custom functionality for a large variety of migration use-cases. The project includes three tools:
